entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: The location where Mundungus was selling magical artifacts.

entities.name: ministry hag
entities.description: A woman who works at the Ministry and is described as a 'hag' by Mundungus.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: The person being questioned by Harry about his encounter with the Ministry hag.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A member of Dumbledore's Army who helps to put out Mundungus' eyebrows.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A member of Dumbledore's Army whose face reflects Harry's shock.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who is questioning Mundungus about his encounter with the Ministry hag.

entities.name: locket
entities.description: A magical artifact that the Ministry hag took from Mundungus.

relationships.description: Harry is questioning Mundungus about his encounter with the Ministry hag.
The Ministry hag took the locket from Mundungus.
Hermione helped to put out Mundungus' eyebrows.
Harry and Ron shared a moment of shock.
